atsumaru.meaning: to gather; to collect; to assemble

atsumeru.meaning: to collect; to assemble; to gather

geninsuru.meaning: to cause; to be caused by

hiraku.meaning: to open; to undo; to unseal; to unpack

isogu.meaning: to hurry; to rush; to hasten; to make something happen sooner

kikoeru.meaning: to be heard; to be audible; to be said

mieru.meaning: to be seen; to be in sight; to look; to seem

mitsukaru.meaning: to be found; to be discovered

mitsukeru.meaning: to discover; to find; to come across; to detect; to spot

nebousuru.meaning: to sleep in late; to oversleep

norikaeru.meaning: to change between buses or trains

okonau.meaning: to perform; to do; to carry out

renrakusuru.meaning: to contact; to get in touch

tariru.meaning: to be sufficient; to be enough

tetsudau.meaning: to help; to assist; to aid

torikaeru.meaning: to exchange; to swap; to replace

tsudzukeru.meaning: to continue; to keep up; to keep on

ukeru.meaning: to take a lesson or test
